Message:
I was hiding in my room,
when something strange
caught my eye.

The part of the wooden floor
I was touching was black...
in the shape of my hand...

My lord rushed over
and hugged me tight.

“N-No! If you touch me, my lord,
even you will...!”
But, he didn’t let me go.

“It’s okay,” he said.
“There’s nothing to worry about.”

Hearing his gentle words
slowly calmed down
the scary power in my heart.

“That should help you
keep yourself together
for the moment,”
assured Granny Rosalie.

“However, this is bound
to happen again.
A witch’s power comes
from the heart.

I understand this may be
painful for you, but you must
face what lies in your heart.”
